body:
Heeelloo!

I recently got promoted to Moderator on a +6000 players server, and i was wondering if you guys(Staff), use any Mods that help you out whilst moderating
body_tagged:
Heeelloo!

I recently got promoted to Moderator on a +6000 players server, and i was wondering if you guys(Staff), use any Mods that help you out whilst moderating
title: Question to Staff

replies.body:
I personally don't use it while moderating MCSG because I type fast but if you really want using a chat macro will help if you want to quickly warn other players/mute/ban/kick by macroing the command/message.
I'm a fast typer to write the message and MCSG has a special thing called XKMBG that assists us
(X = Our ban Database; K = Kick; M = Mute; B = Ban; G = Goto)
replies.body_tagged:
I personally don't use it while moderating MCSG because I type fast but if you really want using a chat macro will help if you want to quickly warn other players/mute/ban/kick by macroing the command/message.
I'm a fast typer to write the message and MCSG has a special thing called XKMBG that assists us
(X = Our ban Database; K = Kick; M = Mute; B = Ban; G = Goto)

replies.body: Well I don't, but Javi uses some crazy mod with a HUD and everything
replies.body_tagged: Well I don't, but Javi uses some crazy mod with a HUD and everything

replies.body: I believe working completely manual is better; you don't depend on mods to help you moderate. I'd much rather improve myself than using mods to improve for me :)
replies.body_tagged: I believe working completely manual is better; you don't depend on mods to help you moderate. I'd much rather improve myself than using mods to improve for me :)

replies.body: I personally only use mods like optifine. I don't use any other complicated or crazy mods.
replies.body_tagged: I personally only use mods like optifine. I don't use any other complicated or crazy mods.

replies.body:
Just asking, but couldn't you have asked the people at the 6000+ server? :P

Anyways, I don't use any mods other than optifine, but there are a few nice vanilla tricks you can use to find force fielders.
replies.body_tagged:
Just asking, but couldn't you have asked the people at the 6000+ server? :P

Anyways, I don't use any mods other than optifine, but there are a few nice vanilla tricks you can use to find force fielders.

replies.body: I believe he is  referring to something like f3+B , which highlights all entities + a players head and body , and shows a blue line indicating a players vision.
replies.body_tagged: I believe he is  referring to something like f3+B , which highlights all entities + a players head and body , and shows a blue line indicating a players vision.

replies.body: Very helpful to zoom-in on fast fly hackers.
replies.body_tagged: Very helpful to zoom-in on fast fly hackers.

reply_to.body: I personally only use mods like optifine. I don't use any other complicated or crazy mods.
reply_to.body_tagged: I personally only use mods like optifine. I don't use any other complicated or crazy mods.

replies.body: if you moderate on a 6000+ server, the moderators on a 75max server will have methods that wont always work on a server with much more
replies.body_tagged: if you moderate on a 6000+ server, the moderators on a 75max server will have methods that wont always work on a server with much more
